description: Spacious 4-bedroom home with an open floor plan and large backyard. Features a modern kitchen, master suite with walk-in closet, and two-car garage. Located in a friendly neighborhood close to schools and parks.
Modern 3-bedroom house with high ceilings and a gourmet kitchen. Enjoy the open-concept living space, large windows, and private backyard. Conveniently located near downtown.
New construction with modern finishes and a home office. This 5-bedroom home includes a state-of-the-art kitchen, spacious living area, and finished basement. Close to top-rated schools.
Mix of classic and contemporary styles with a landscaped backyard. Features hardwood floors, formal dining room, and cozy fireplace. Located in a serene neighborhood with excellent schools.
Bright and airy home with a private pool and guest suite. The villa offers an open floor plan, a chef's kitchen, and ocean views. The outdoor area includes a kitchen and lounge area by the pool.
Updated colonial-style home with stainless steel appliances and a fireplace. Features 3 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, and a finished attic. Located in a historic neighborhood with tree-lined streets.
Modern home with panoramic city views and a rooftop deck. This 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom home features sleek design, an open-concept living space, and a gourmet kitchen. Located in the heart of the city.
Welcoming home with a front porch, large family room, and garden. Features 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, a large kitchen with a breakfast nook, and a sunroom. Located in a family-friendly neighborhood.

Charming 3-bedroom home with a large backyard and updated kitchen. Offers a cozy living room with a fireplace, a study for a home office, and a modern kitchen with granite countertops. Located in a quiet suburb.
